text: The flea market which happens on every first Sunday morning of the month is üëç. Need to go early for good bargain items as it is only from 8-12 noon

I went there for booster vaccination. Even though queue was long and one has to wait alot for their turn, the place was well managed. Staff and doctors were cordial. Car parking area is spacious. Overall a good experience.

Bedok Community Centre:
Located just minutes away from Bedok MRT station and bus interchange, and opposite the Bedok Swimming Complex, the CC provides a place of fun and games for sports enthusiasts. The CC offers a wide range of sports facilities from gateball courts to sheltered basketball and badminton courts.
Besides sports, there is wireless broadband access throughout the CC.

Call to find out more about the services and facilities available.
Current Operating Hours

Community Clubs/Centres (CCs):
Facilities: 10am - 10pm
Counter Services: 10am - 6pm
Closed on public holidays

Void Deck CCs:
Facilities: 2pm - 10pm
Counter Services: 2pm - 6pm
Closed on public holidays
Counter staff are friendly. The common areas are well maintained. Facilities are adequate for the community.
A quiet community centre, but seems to have lots of activities for the older folks!
